post:
**GalaxyHostPlus** had plans updates on 1st Of August 2016 and improve to their services.

All new Plan are on new Cloud Module for SolusVM allows you to Create and Destroy VM any time, It also allow you to create multi VPS from package resources.

Our new KVM plans are deployed with latest hardware 

> CPU: Intel Xeon E5 E5-1650v3
>
> RAM: 64 GB DDR4
>
> Storage: x8 2TB Hard RAID 10 + SSD Cache
>
> Network 1Gbps Uplink Private Vlan

**KVM - 2016 K1**

    Disk Space = 50 GB
    Ram = 512 MB DDR4
    CPU Cores = x2
    Bandwidth = 1 TB
    x2 IPv4  included + /80 Ipv6 subnet
    Control Panel = SolusVM Cloud Module
    Create, Remove VPS anytime
    Variety of choices of Linux OS - Windows & ISO
    Location: Germany, Frankfurt
    KVM Virtualization
    24/7 Free Premium support
    99.99% Network Uptime  (SLA Support soon)

$7 /Monthly

[https://secure.galaxyhostplus.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=167](https://secure.galaxyhostplus.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=167)



Our new OpenVZ plans are also included on Cloud Module.
